title: Fix missing gear/armor/weapon items in data
description:
Fix missing gear/armor/weapon items in template or expansion data.

## Armor Items
| Item | Expansion | Issue |
|------|-----------|-------|
| Vagabond Armor | Core | Not in template |
| White Sunlion Mask | Core | Not in template |
| God Mask (CE) | Community Edition | Non-CE variant 'God Mask' exists |

## Weapon Items

title: Allow pairing weapons with different names
description:
Allow Aya's Spear and Aya's Sword to be paired despite having different names.

## User Story
As a player, when I equip Aya's Spear and Aya's Sword together, I want them to be recognized as a paired weapon set so that I get the pairing bonuses.

## Context
- Currently only weapons with identical names can pair
- Aya's weapons are the only case needing cross-name pairing
- Template needs 'Aya's Spear' and 'Aya's Sword' added (don't exist yet)
- Code currently has incomplete name 'Aya's'

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Aya's Spear and Aya's Sword can be paired
- [ ] Existing same-name pairing still works (Bone Hatchet, Tempered Axe)
- [ ] Template contains Aya's Spear and Aya's Sword
